task_summary: Detect the green trash bin, pre-open the gripper, approach and align to the lid edge, make contact, grasp, and lift the bin lid open; verify it is open and retreat safely.

task_long_description.overview: A mobile manipulator interacts with a green garbage bin positioned beside a table. The robot must open the hinged bin lid by grasping its front edge and lifting it. The sequence prioritizes reliable perception of the bin, careful approach with alignment, gentle contact, a low-force grasp, and a lifting action executed via an explicit container-opening primitive. The scene shows the arm approaching from the right with the bin and translucent liner visible. Safety requires verifying that the lid is open before retreating.
preconditions: Workspace clear around the green bin
Camera has unobstructed view of bin lid edge
stepwise_plan: Move above lid edge with small vertical offset
Approach and align to lid edge within 1 cm tolerance
Close gripper with low force to secure edge
Open the container (bin lid) by lifting
success_criteria: No collision with table or bin body
failure_and_recovery: Perception fails → re-detect or scan area
Misalignment/slip → reopen gripper, realign, and retry approach
Insufficient lift → reissue OpenContainer with slightly longer duration
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when lid state is open and the arm has retreated to a safe pose.

frame_3.now_evidence: End effector closely aligned with the lid edge, indicating successful approach and alignment.
frame_3.predicts_next: Contact and grasp are imminent, after which lifting should occur.

task_instruction: lift open green garbage can lid

node_specs.description: Detects the green garbage bin in view.
Prepares gripper for grasp by opening wide.
Moves to a pregrasp pose above the lid edge.
Approaches and aligns laterally to the edge for a stable grasp.
Descends gently until contact with the lid edge is detected.
Grasps the lid edge with low force.
Lifts to open the bin lid using a dedicated primitive.
Checks whether the bin lid is open.
Backs away to a safe distance after opening.

recovery_strategy: Use slower descent and smaller tolerance
Retreat and re-approach from a slightly higher pregrasp
assumptions: Frames show a green bin with a hinged lid; the approach is from the right; grasp is on the front edge without a discrete handle.

expected_success_criteria: No collision or excessive force events
